scripts.build: esbuild index.js --bundle --format=cjs --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.js && npm run build:wasm && cp dist/main.wasm examples/react/public/
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -tags jwx_es256k -o ../dist/main.wasm && cd .. && echo "\033[0;32mcompiled wasm successfully!\033[0m"
scripts.buildtiny: esbuild index.js --bundle --format=cjs --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.js && npm run build:tiny && cp dist/main.wasm examples/react/public/
scripts.build:tiny: cd wasm && tinygo build -tags="jwx_es256k wasm js" -o ../dist/main.wasm -target wasm && cd .. && echo "\033[0;32mcompiled wasm successfully!\033[0m"
